title.value: ECBD: Evidence-Centered Benchmark Design for NLP
title.justification: It is the title as mentioned at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: ECBD: Evidence-Centered Benchmark Design for NLP

extractions.description: The paper introduces the Evidence-Centered Benchmark Design (ECBD), a framework adapted from educational assessments, to provide a systematic way of designing NLP benchmarks. ECBD breaks down the process into five modules and aims to enhance validity in benchmark measurements by encouraging thorough documentation and justification of design decisions.

type.justification: The paper discusses case studies of benchmarks (BoolQ, SuperGLUE, and HELM) using the ECBD framework, which indicates empirical examination and analysis.
type.quote: To illustrate ECBD’s usage for benchmark analysis, we organize these questions into a worksheet (Appendix A) and apply it to three different benchmarks: BoolQ (Clark et al., 2019), SuperGLUE (Wang et al., 2019), and HELM (Liang et al., 2022).

name.justification: The paper centers on designing benchmarks using the ECBD framework.
